profile.description:
I'm a junior developer in the Frontend area and entering also to Backend development.
I am looking to specialize in the technologies that I already know and improve every day.

achievements.achievement-1-description: Participation in the 2023 Microsoft Office Specialist National Competition in the Microsoft Word category.

education.education-description: First year student of Systems Engineering at the Mariano GÃ¡lvez University of Guatemala.

projects.project-1-description: Page to play tic-tac-toe, it has three boards and you can play on your mobile.
projects.project-2-description: Page to see what are the trending movies.
projects.project-3-description: Page to make a CRUD using the IndexedDB API of the browser.
projects.project-5-description: My web portfolio, with some projects and my contact information.
projects.project-6-description: Mini project made in C# using Windows forms that present three menus and meals depending on the selected time.
projects.project-7-description: Management System type page to view, modify, delete or add users, it connects to a database using servlets and JPA.
projects.project-8-description: Calculator that shows a person's body mass index and whether they are healthy or not.
